channel.title: Need Help making some Shops/Starter editing/Xp Rates/Theiving
channel.description:
Shops (Admin Spot)
ok so, i just got a good source, and i wanna add some shops to it, but im a horrible shop coder, so can someone send me the files for a shop with these item in it. if you do, add me on msn a-d-a-m-c-o-u-r-t_@hotmail.com and ill make you admin on my server, and tell me where to put them, thanks, here are the items i want in a shop
Dragon Boots 15m Dragon Legs 25m Dragon chain 30m Dragon full helm 70m DFS 100m Helm of neit 200k Abyssal Whip 20m Dragon Claws 250m
If you have to come see my server. then add my msn, and ill tell you the coords i want this shop at, and yeh, the prices are posed next to the item if you were wondering. if you can help me ill send you the link and give you admin on my server, thanks alot.
Now for the Starter Editing. (Mod Spot)
I just want my starter to be 15m and Bronze Scim and Rune scim. Can someone tell me what to search to change it, i have all the item ids and stuff, thanks.
Exp Rates (Admin Spot)
I want to make combat xp rates to 1000 per hit, and for theiving, i want to make 1st stall 500xp, second 5000 xp and third 15000 xp, thanks.
Thieving (Mod Spot)
i want to change the amount of cash you get from each stall, like. 1st stall 25k, 2nd stall 50k, 3rd stall 100k.
If you can answer ANY of these add my msn, (posted above) and ill send you a download link and you can be part of my server staff
Thanks to whoever can help, and thanks for reading.
